description: Demonstrates narrator continuity - the narrator remembers what it said before and builds on it

inputs_schema.topic: A topic to research in multiple phases

phases.name: overview
phases.instructions: Provide a brief 2-3 sentence overview of '{{ input.topic }}'. Keep it high-level.

phases.name: deep_dive
phases.instructions: Now provide 2-3 specific technical details or interesting facts about '{{ input.topic }}' that weren't covered in the overview.

phases.name: future
phases.instructions: Finally, discuss 1-2 future trends or developments related to '{{ input.topic }}'.
